channel.title: Iaido on Meishin Muso Ryu
channel.description: Recent content in Iaido on Meishin Muso Ryu

item.title: Palmetto Fall Clinic
item.description: Shuji Matsushita sensei, Katsunori Matsushita sensei and Professor Tom Hill recently taught at the annual International Palmetto Fall Clinic in Lexington, South Carolina.

item.title: Lessons from 2018 Iaido Seminar
item.description: Shuji Matsushita Sensei led the 2018 Fall Meishin Muso Ryu Iaido Seminar from Sept. 15-16 at Shudokan Dojo in Stroudsburg, PA. Here are some of our lessons …

item.title: Iaido Seminar will be Sept. 15-16, 2018
item.description: We will have the 2018 Fall Meishin Muso Ryu Iaido Seminar on the weekend of Sept. 15-16, led by Shuji Matsushita Sensei.
